Description: After removing the database ensure that update takes place without problems, in a single step

Get an image and fill the photo with tapped areas and save, test the up/down arrows, scrolling collection views, going in/out of Match VCs, remove add tap areas, and finally remove all tap areas and Match assoc (verify in simulator DB that all components got removed)
Switch between views, for each scroll fast down and then back up, randomly scroll a few collection views (if applicable), and randomly go in/out of child controllers
Create a temporary color association of at least 5 elements and delete all of them
Create a temporary match association of at least 5 taps and delete all of them
